title: Custom sizes
description:
Create custom sized frames by selecting the frame tool and click
            and drag your cursor to the disired size.

title: Preset sizes
description:
Create frames with preset sizes e.g. iPhone X, by selecting the
        preset in the Properties panel on the right-hand side.

title: Existing elements
description:
Create frames from existing elements on the canvas by right-clicking
        and selecting Frame Selection.
